java/liquibase/database/UnsupportedDatabase.java

00001 package liquibase.database;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.exception.JDBCException;
00004 
00005 import java.sql.Connection;
00006 import java.sql.ResultSet;
00007 import java.sql.SQLException;
00008 import java.sql.Types;
00009 
00010 public class UnsupportedDatabase extends AbstractDatabase {
00011     private String dateTimeType;
00012 
00013 
00014     public void setConnection(Connection conn) {
00015         super.setConnection(conn);
00016         dateTimeType = findDateTypeType();
00017         if (currentDateTimeFunction == null) {
00018             currentDateTimeFunction = findCurrentDateTimeFunction();
00019         }
00020     }
00021 
00025     public String getDefaultCatalogName() throws JDBCException {
00026         return null;
00027     }
00028 
00032     protected String getDefaultDatabaseSchemaName() throws JDBCException {
00033         return null;
00034     }
00035 
00036     public String getBooleanType() {
00037         return "INT";
00038     }
00039 
00040 
00041     public String getFalseBooleanValue() {
00042         return "0";
00043     }
00044 
00045     public String getTrueBooleanValue() {
00046         return "1";
00047     }
00048 
00049     public String getCurrencyType() {
00050         return "DECIMAL";
00051     }
00052 
00053     public String getUUIDType() {
00054         return "CHAR(36)";
00055     }
00056 
00057     public String getClobType() {
00058         return "CLOB";
00059     }
00060 
00061     public String getBlobType() {
00062         return "BLOB";
00063     }
00064 
00065     public String getDateTimeType() {
00066         return dateTimeType;
00067     }
00068 
00069     private String findDateTypeType() {
00070         ResultSet typeInfo = null;
00071         try {
00072             typeInfo = getConnection().getMetaData().getTypeInfo();
00073             while (typeInfo.next()) {
00074                 if (typeInfo.getInt("DATA_TYPE") == Types.TIMESTAMP) {
00075                     return typeInfo.getString("TYPE_NAME");
00076                 }
00077             }
00078         } catch (SQLException e) {
00079             throw new RuntimeException(e);
00080         } finally {
00081             if (typeInfo != null) {
00082                 try {
00083                     typeInfo.close();
00084                 } catch (SQLException e) {
00085                     ;
00086                 }
00087             }
00088         }
00089         return "DATETIME";
00090     }
00091 
00092     public boolean isCorrectDatabaseImplementation(Connection conn) throws JDBCException {
00093         return false;
00094     }
00095 
00096     public String getDefaultDriver(String url) {
00097         return null;
00098     }    
00099 
00100     public String getProductName() {
00101         return "Unsupported Database ("+getDatabaseProductName()+")";
00102     }
00103 
00104     public String getTypeName() {
00105         return getDatabaseProductName().toLowerCase().replaceAll("\\W","");
00106     }
00107 
00108     public boolean supportsInitiallyDeferrableColumns() {
00109         return false;
00110     }
00111 
00112     public String getCurrentDateTimeFunction() {
00113         return currentDateTimeFunction;
00114     }
00115 
00116     private String findCurrentDateTimeFunction() {
00117         try {
00118             String nowFunction = null;
00119             String dateFunction = null;
00120             String dateTimeFunction = null;
00121             String timeStampFunction = null;
00122 
00123             String[] timeDateFunctions = getConnection().getMetaData().getTimeDateFunctions().split(",");
00124             for (String functionName : timeDateFunctions) {
00125                 String function = functionName.trim().toUpperCase();
00126                 if (function.endsWith("TIMESTAMP")) {
00127                     timeStampFunction = functionName.trim();
00128                 }
00129                 if (function.endsWith("DATETIME")) {
00130                     dateTimeFunction = functionName.trim();
00131                 }
00132                 if (function.endsWith("DATE")) {
00133                     dateFunction = functionName.trim();
00134                 }
00135                 if ("NOW".equals(function)) {
00136                     nowFunction = functionName.trim();
00137                 }
00138             }
00139 
00140             if (nowFunction != null) {
00141                 return "{fn "+nowFunction+"()"+"}";
00142             } else if (timeStampFunction != null) {
00143                 return "{fn "+timeStampFunction+"()"+"}";
00144             } else if (dateTimeFunction != null) {
00145                 return "{fn "+dateTimeFunction+"()"+"}";
00146             } else if (dateFunction != null) {
00147                 return "{fn "+dateFunction+"()"+"}";
00148             } else {
00149                 return "NOW()";
00150             }
00151 
00152         } catch (SQLException e) {
00153             throw new RuntimeException(e);
00154         }
00155     }
00156 
00157 
00158     protected boolean canCreateChangeLogTable() throws JDBCException {
00159         //check index size.  Many drivers just return 0, so it's not a great test
00160         int maxIndexLength;
00161         try {
00162             maxIndexLength = getConnection().getMetaData().getMaxIndexLength();
00163 
00164             return maxIndexLength == 0
00165                     || maxIndexLength >= 150 + 150 + 255 //id + author + filename length 
00166                     && super.canCreateChangeLogTable();
00167         } catch (SQLException e) {
00168             throw new JDBCException(e);
00169         }
00170     }
00171 
00172     public boolean supportsTablespaces() {
00173         return false;
00174     }
00175 }
